channel.title: Fedora on Remo Bertschinger
channel.description: Recent content in Fedora on Remo Bertschinger

item.title: Installing packages on minimal Fedora - Part 2
item.description: Now that I have internet access, I’ll be able to install packages simply with the package manager. Let’s install a desktop environment and other core packages.

item.title: Installing minimal Fedora on my T480 - Part 1
item.description: Today I will be installing a minimal Fedora 34 setup on my Lenovo T480.
